name: A Knock On The Mole
description:
This is the classic "Hit the mole"-game, turned into a two person game. In this version, one strikes the hammer while the other controls the moles. The goal of the game is to score more points then the opponent.

The game is controlled by one player controlling the hammer with the mouse and while another controlling the moles with the keyboard. 
More instruction on how to play the game, can be found in the game.

Good luck and have fun
